RelatedSentence: A fungus called coffee rust has already caused more than $ 1 billion in damage to coffee crops across Latin America .
And it 's affecting the price of some types of coffee in the United States .
The U.S. government is stepping up its efforts to help Central American farmers fight the coffee disease .
